data.text: @usvi_dpo @VI_Source @govhouseusvi @govbryan How do you say you’re not a native without saying you’re not a native? Hint: Look for code word “patriot”

@VI_Source What a joke.  This Governor is doing such damage to our children.  Would love to see the science he is using to make his decisions. Even CA and NY have dropped the mask mandates.  Please, ask to see the science behind the masks….guess what, there’s none!
@govhouseusvi @govbryan
